EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Post-Event Thank you 12-11-17
EmailTemplate.subject: That’s a wrap! Thank You for Attending SpringOne 2017; Watch the Recordings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=S1P-Thank-You!]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, With 2800+ attendees, 145+ talks, 200+ speakers, 32 keynotes, and 43 sponsors, SpringOne Platform 2017 was electric! Leading software companies, enterprises, and cloud experts came together to collaborate, share knowledge, and create transformational software. Thank you for being part of it!
Bring SpringOne Platform Home Mainstage and breakout session recordings are being added daily! Subscribe to Pivotal’s YouTube <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ2uPeB0bByiIUMLVAhrPHL]]> playlist <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ2uPeB0bByiIUMLVAhrPHL]]> to be notified when new and public recordings become available. And catch up through our blog recaps from Monday <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/participation-is-required-day-1-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=S1P-Thank-You!]]>, Tuesday <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/the-platform-evolves-day-2-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=S1P-Thank-You!]]>, Wednesday <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/the-hard-stuff-day-3-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=S1P-Thank-You!]]>, and Thursday <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/a-look-to-the-future-day-4-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=S1P-Thank-You!]]>.
Check Out All the News from SpringOne Platform From Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.0 to major ecosystem announcements, you can check out all the news from SpringOne Platform here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=S1P-Thank-You!]]>.
Save the Date: September 24-28, 2018 in D.C. If you thought this year was great, just wait and see what we have in store for 2018. Sign up <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=S1P-Thank-You!]]> to stay informed and join us in Washington, D.C. September 24-28, 2018 at the Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center.
We hope to see you next year!
The SpringOne Platform and Pivotal Teams
